channel.title: Devolution 9.4
channel.description:
server base: devolution 7.0, NOT FUCKING DELTASCAPE, this was made before deltascape was released, go figure.
basic information:
100% real rs style ranging, seriously...(arrow pullbacks,projectiles through the air, delay hits, JUST LIKE REAL RS) 100% melee, without specials. (delayed hits, proper weapon speeds) 100% mage apart from autocasting. (uses runes, all animations, splashs etc..) 100% melee defence and attack bonus's 100% mage bonus's with splashing
ok well this is a extended version of the last release, i have fixed alot of things so its alot more professional looking. ill just say what iv'e done 1xiix1 done the theiving and dragons but i fixed them up alittle
I never post any of my work on mopar anymore apart from this, most the morons here only want pictures, DOWNLOAD AND TEST THE SERVER, PROVES MORE THAN PICTURES.
[size=10pt][center]FEATURES[/center][/size]
[center][b]VERSION 9.u.4[/b][/center]
made ranging more smooth, no more jumpy players while ranging, uses moveto() instead of teleportx and y. REMOVED all weapon specials as i was working on a new special system which is actualy already made just havnt added it to the public release servers. changed the experience to 300 so people stop complaining about it being to low...... fully redesigned the way the attacking methods work and look for npc and pvp, there now alot nicer to read and to add new things. npc wont walk over the top of each other anymore. added dragons with firebreath and antishields made a new home so people enjoy the server more, added theiving from all the ardy stalls, and a theiving shop, theiving capes show up in the shop only if you have 99 in theiving for it. fixed some more pvp issues, like you do not have enough arrows, etc. changed the dos screen displays, and added some helpful things fully replaced all the teleportX = absX and the y with a much better method which doesnt make the players jump around. theres alot more but iv'e been away for a week so i have forgotten a few things.
[center][b] VERSION 9.u.3[/b][/center]
-dueing now has the dueling sign and i have added a teleport on ancients so players can go there and stake!. not all the buttons will work cause you guys got to do some work. -wildy now have warning signs that show up only once per login, so if you run in to the wildy it teles you 1 square back and shows a warning sign so you know where it is. -magic now works woot!, also magic defence and attack bonus's work so players can fail (splash) its realy awsome. -pking has been made 100x more enjoyable with players able to get there drops now, also it keeps your 3 best items on you and barrow items degrade apon death, also if you have a fire cape youll keep it.
[center][b]VERSION 9.u.2[/b][/center]
95% pvp melee includes (delayed hits, specs,eating,dieing) - 100% pvp ranged, includes(delayed hits, all projectiles,double hitting darkbow, specs) - wildy signs and levels - full combat differences - all specials (dds,dlong,dmace,maul,dscim,magic shortbow,d halberd) - also added a teleport to wildy in ancients, use :: switch to get to it
[center][b] VERSION 9.u.1[/b][/center]
fixed melee so it will actually work again. fixed melee and specials so there heaps more realistic. fixed ranged even more, added my own code to make the damage display when the arrow hits the npc.
[center][b]VERSION 8.0[/b][/center]
100% ranged, now supports pvp with double hitting and more. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZV-au9HKajo -Dark Bow has been added id=15156, now double hits npcs and players. -crystal bow fully added, doesnt require arrows. -THE CLIENT? alot of people are asking whats the best client for this, well i'll tell you right now, its the silab client, or a client with the same ids based off the silab client. www.client.silasoft.org/client.php -DDS will now double hit players in wildy, but still sometimes misses a spec, still yet to figure out whats causing this. -there has been alot of changes throughout the server, alot of things do go unnoticed. but there is changes. -a few more npcs added around the places. -please note this wont be the final product of this, its just the early release. but it is a good base to use as starting sources, and lag free servers. -magic has not been finished yet, but i have made some big progress on its new base. -there is more than this that has been updated, but i cbf telling it all.
[center][b]VERSIONS 7.9 and below[/b][/center]
added all weapon animations added support for all bows added npc's face players added player facing npcs added timers on eating, this also adds a wait when eating till the next attack, like real rs added better way of giving first items, no stupid commands..... added maul special, thanks pk-town added d long special added d mace special added d scimitar special added dds special, finaly 100% complete. added crystal bow and darkbow fixed repeative animations fixed range up abit fixed npcs glitched hp fixed food healing fixed the :layers command screen fixed some bugs like range not hitting, not giving exp, only now its not as pretty -updated beyond this added prefect weapon timers for all weapons
download link http://uppit.com/SHCFTK

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“baxi60, post:18, topic:254444”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=336230.msg2614617#msg2614617 date=1230956931]
when i downloaded it and ran it i got this

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . . idk whats up but i just ran it and it said that
[/quote]

U get this error by you dont have compiled your server, click on your “compile.bat” File, and if that doesn’t work download this and install it https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_Developer-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=jdk-6u11-oth-JPR@CDS-CDS_Developer[/quote]
ill try and compile but i am not downloading any other programs till i get a new comp =\ might be able to get by next week

killamess:

if you get an error like that you must of changed something, just redownload it.

and ill redownload if the compile don’t work

EDIT: compile worked it now loads
